## BearerTokenAuthenticator class

The BearerTokenAuthenticator will set a user-provided bearer token in requests.

The bearer token will be sent as an Authorization header in the form:

Authorization: Bearer &lt;<!-- -->bearer-token<!-- -->&gt;

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BearerTokenAuthenticator extends Authenticator 
```
**Extends:** [Authenticator](./ibm-cloud-sdk-core.authenticator.md)
